title: After 6 Years, Toyota Echo Lawsuit Ends With a How-To Video
description: For years, Toyota drivers complained that their vehicles turned hands-free calls into a maddening experience. The system bounced voices back as an echo, making conversations nearly impossible. After a six-year legal battle, the class action lawsuit has finally been settled. The outcome? Fourteen ...
titleSummary: "Defunct Toyota Model Finally Settled Out of Court in Unconventional Fashion"
descriptionSummary: Toyota drivers who suffered through frustrating phone calls on the go can finally breathe a sigh of relief. A six-year lawsuit has ended with a settlement that addresses long-standing issues with the car's hands-free system.

title: Mercedes-Benz offloads Nissan stake as investor confidence declines
description: Nissan is attempting to rebound from a desperate financial situation that nearly led to a merger with Honda, but some investors aren't waiting around to see whether the automaker pulls it off. One of them just happens to be another large automaker. Mercedes-Benz has offloaded a 3.8% stake in Nissan ...
titleSummary: Mercedes-Benz Dumps Nissan Stake Amid Fading Investor Optimism
descriptionSummary: Nissan's efforts to recover from financial struggles that once threatened its very existence are being closely watched, but some investors are taking matters into their own hands. German rival Daimler has quietly sold a significant share of Nissan stock.

title: Rivian Adds Apple CarKey, But Still Refuses CarPlay Integration
description: Rivian owners with iPhones are finally getting some long-awaited love. The EV startup has started rolling out support for Apple CarKey on its second-generation R1T and R1S models, letting drivers unlock and start their trucks or SUVs with an iPhone or Apple Watch — even if the device ...
titleSummary: Rivian Joins App-Enabled Ranks, Yet Holds Firm on In-Car Entertainment Partnership Rejection
descriptionSummary: Rivian owners with iPhones are in for a treat. The electric vehicle maker has begun integrating Apple's CarKey feature into select models, enabling seamless keyless entry and ignition using an iPhone or Apple Watch.

title: Hyundai's compact EV concept gets an official name
description: Hyundai has revealed the name of a compact EV concept it plans to unveil at the upcoming 2025 Munich Auto Show: Concept Three. That indicates the eventual production version will likely be called the Hyundai Ioniq 3, even though some reports hinted the name would be Ioniq 2. But Hyundai has ...

descriptionSummary: Hyundai's compact electric vehicle concept is set to debut at the 2025 Munich Auto Show under the name Concept Three, suggesting a production model that will likely bear the Hyundai Ioniq 3 badge, rather than previously rumored Ioniq 2 moniker.

title: Tesla Revamps FSD Subscription With Trial Access Amid Scrutiny
description: Tesla is rewriting the playbook on how it sells its Full Self-Driving (FSD) software. Instead of burying the option behind menus or forcing buyers to fork out the full $8,000, Tesla has added the subscription option — along with a free trial — directly into its Design Studio vehicle ...
titleSummary: "Tesla Overhauls Full Self-Drive Service, Offers Free Test Period Under Fire"
descriptionSummary: Tesla has simplified access to its Full Self-Driving (FSD) software by introducing a subscription model and complimentary trial in its Design Studio, offering buyers a more flexible way to experience this advanced technology.

title: A Chinese vacuum maker wants to take on Bugatti
description: Dreame Technology, a Chinese electronics company best known for vacuum cleaners, this week announced that it would launch an electric supercar by 2027. As if that wasn't ambitious enough for a company new to the auto industry, Dreame specifically called out Bugatti in its announcement and said its ...
titleSummary: "China's Humble Maker Sets Sights on Supercar Supremacy with Bugatti Challenge"
descriptionSummary: Chinese electronics firm Dreame Technology is making a bold entrance into the automotive world, with plans to unveil an electric supercar by 2027. The company's announcement takes aim at luxury rivals like Bugatti, setting the bar high for its ambitious debut.

title: 2026 Charger Daytona Gets Cheaper, Yet Faces Tougher Odds
description: When Dodge unveiled the Charger Daytona, it billed the model as the next chapter in muscle car performance. What buyers got instead was an electric coupe that left much of its core audience unconvinced. The sound generator, futuristic styling, and the absence of a V6 or V8 were meant to push the ...
titleSummary: "Downsizing Dodge's Electric Dream: The Charger Daytona's Price Cut Puts it to the Test"
descriptionSummary: Dodge's Charger Daytona electrified expectations with promises of unparalleled muscle car prowess, but instead delivered a sleek, high-tech coupe that departed from traditional roots, leaving some enthusiasts skeptical about its performance credentials.

title: Jay Leno Tried to Save Car Culture – California Shut Him Down
description: California has always been the beating heart of American car culture, but lawmakers just reminded everyone that nostalgia doesn’t count for much at the Capitol. Senate Bill 712, better known as “Leno’s Law,” was meant to give classic car owners a break from the state’s strict smog check program. ...
titleSummary: "Leno's Automotive Dream Shifts into Reverse Amid California's Emissions Crackdown"
descriptionSummary: California's reputation as the epicenter of American car culture has been put on notice by lawmakers who are prioritizing policy over passion. A new law is set to change how classic cars navigate the state's rigorous emissions testing.

title: From Cybertruck to Cyber SUV? Tesla Leaves Hints, Not Answers
description: The Tesla Cybertruck was introduced with great anticipation, backed by more than a million reservations and the promise of a pickup that could rival traditional full-size trucks while undercutting them on price. The production version, however, fell far short of expectations. Only over 40,000 units ...
titleSummary: "Tesla Teases a New Model: A Next-Gen Electric Vehicle Beyond the Truck"
descriptionSummary: The Tesla Cybertruck's highly anticipated debut was met with excitement, fueled by over a million pre-orders and the promise of a budget-friendly pickup that could rival traditional full-size trucks. Unfortunately, its production iteration failed to live up to the hype.

title: Leaked: Audi’s New Sports Car Looks Like A TT And R8 Lovechild
description: The departure of the Audi TT and R8 with no immediate replacements was sad news for Audi enthusiasts. Currently, the brand has no genuine sports car, but Audi’s CEO raised hopes when he mentioned a concept would be coming soon, describing it as the company’s “TT moment 2.0” recently—strong words ...

descriptionSummary: Audi fans were dismayed to hear that the TT and R8 are leaving without direct successors, leaving the brand's sports car lineup in limbo – but fresh hope has emerged with rumors of a new concept on the horizon.

title: Volkswagen Teases Its Most Affordable Electric SUV Yet
description: Volkswagen has been steadily expanding its family of electric vehicles, but most of its current offerings sit in the midrange to premium end of the market. The ID.3 and ID.4 were solid VW offerings, yet both are priced beyond what many buyers would consider truly affordable. At the same time, ...
titleSummary: "VW Unveils Budget-Friendly EV Crossover: A New Entry Point for Eco-Minded Buyers"
descriptionSummary: Volkswagen has been building out its lineup of electric vehicles, but most have skewed towards higher price points. Its latest models, while well-received, may be out of reach for budget-conscious shoppers.

title: Feds Audit Tesla Over FSD Crashes — What Owners Should Know
description: The U.S. auto-safety regulator has opened an audit into Tesla after finding the company filed crash reports months late for incidents involving Autopilot and Full Self-Driving. Federal rules say those reports should arrive within one to five days of a company learning about a crash. Tesla told ...

descriptionSummary: The US National Highway Traffic Safety Administration is conducting an investigation into Tesla's compliance with safety regulations, following allegations the company delayed filing reports on crashes involving its Autopilot and Full Self-Driving features.

title: Lotus Emira plug-in hybrid coming in 2027
description: Lotus is moving ahead with rumored plans to build a plug-in hybrid version of the Emira with its new "Hyper Hybrid" system, CEO Feng Qingfeng told analysts during the automaker's second-quarter financial results call. This plug-in hybrid system will first appear in an SUV, likely the Eletre, as ...
titleSummary: Lotus Unveils Electric Muscle: Plug-In Hybrid Emira Set to Roar in '27
descriptionSummary: Lotus is reportedly pursuing a plug-in hybrid variant of the Emira, featuring its new "Hyper Hybrid" technology. The innovative powertrain is expected to debut in the Eletre SUV before being adapted for other models.

title: Women Drivers Myth-Busted: 2025 Data Shows Men Lead Fatalities
description: “Women are worse drivers” hangs around because it flatters a stereotype, not because it’s true. Deep down we all know it is a trope, and the newest numbers from all over the world smash it. In Great Britain (2024 provisional), 76% of road fatalities were male and 61% of all casualties were male, ...
titleSummary: "Men Take Lead in Deadly Crashes, Challenging Stereotypes About Female Drivers"
descriptionSummary: The notion that women are worse drivers persists due to its appeal as a stereotype, rather than any factual basis. New data globally reveals this trope is unfounded, with men consistently accounting for the majority of accidents and fatalities on roads.

title: Stellantis Recalls 219,000 U.S. Vehicles Over Rear-View Camera Failure
description: Stellantis is recalling more than 219,000 vehicles in the United States because the rear-view camera can simply stop working and show nothing just when you’re backing toward your neighbor’s trash cans.The recall covers high-volume workhorses the Ram ProMaster (over 141,000 vehicles affected) and ...
titleSummary: "Stellantis Issues Mass Recall of American Cars Due to Faulty Backup Cameras"
descriptionSummary: Stellantis is issuing a massive recall of over 219,000 US vehicles due to a rearview camera issue that can cause it to suddenly malfunction when reversing, potentially leaving drivers without a clear view - or a glimpse into their neighbor's trash cans.

title: Another wagon bites the dust: Volvo V90 production to end
description: Volvo is ending production of its biggest, most luxurious wagon for other markets. Autocar reports that production of the Volvo V90 will cease this month, leaving the Swedish automaker that built its reputation with models like the 240, 740, and 850 wagons with just one example of the body style. ...

descriptionSummary: Volvo is discontinuing its flagship wagon in select markets as the company shifts focus. Production of the V90 will halt this month, leaving Volvo's product lineup with a sole representative from a storied tradition of wagons that defined the brand.

title: Tesla Terminates Contractor at Giga Texas, 82 Workers Laid Off

title: Should You Wait for the 2026 Armada or Buy the 2025 at a Discount?
description: The Nissan Armada entered a new generation for 2025, but the 2026 model year already brings a sharper reality: higher prices across the board. The base SV 4x2 now starts at $58,840, which is about $1,320 more than the outgoing version. The ceiling has also shifted, with the Platinum Reserve 4x4 ...

descriptionSummary: The 2026 Nissan Armada marks a significant pricing shift, with a new base price of $58,840 for the SV 4x2 trim, a $1,320 increase over its predecessor. Top-tier models now command even higher sums.

title: Kia GT1 Confirmed for 2027 Launch as Electric Grand Tourer

descriptionSummary: The curtains have closed on the Kia Stinger's V6 era, but its legacy lives on in the reborn Kia GT1 project, now back in development with a 2027 release date for an all-electric flagship grand tourer set to take center stage.

description: The Honda Prelude is set to return after a hiatus of more than two decades, this time as a Civic-based coupe with hybrid power. descriptionSummary: Honda's Prelude is reviving after a 20-year absence, reborn as a sporty Civic-based coupe with eco-friendly hybrid power. The comeback combines retro charm with cutting-edge tech, yet sparks debate among enthusiasts and critics alike.

description: The Japan Mobility Show, once known as the Tokyo Motor Show, has long been the stage for Japan's most important automotive debuts. title: Tesla Just Learned a $183 Million Lesson in Latest Gamble-Gone-Wrong

After Tesla declined the settlement proposal, offered on May 30, a jury awarded the estate of ...
titleSummary: "Tesla Takes a Shocking Hit in Latest Misjudged Business Bet"
descriptionSummary: A fatal 2019 car accident involving an Autopilot-equipped Tesla led to a $60 million settlement offer that was initially rejected by the company. The rejection ultimately resulted in a significantly larger award to the victim's family from a subsequent jury verdict.

title: Ram 1500 RHO Owners Finally Get The Loud Button They Wanted

titleSummary: Mercedes' Electric Game-Changer to Get Axed After Just One Model Cycle
descriptionSummary: Mercedes-Benz's electric vehicle lineup has struggled to gain traction with customers, partly due to waning interest in EVs and partly because its EQ models haven't quite struck a chord with buyers.

description: The new Ford Mustang GTD is so wide that it nearly crossed into commercial-truck territory. In a direct appeal, industry leaders warned that the proposed 2035 zero-emission ban risks overestimating ...

Claimed by some to instead stand for “Be Your Driver” — due to their cars’ overwhelming presence on Chinese roads and suitability ...

title: 10 Best States for Teen Drivers
description: Despite its reputation for erratic city traffic surrounded by congested metro areas, data from WalletHub has ranked New York as the safest state in the U.S. for teen drivers. All 50 states were evaluated in three primary categories: safety, economic environment, and driving laws. These categories ...

descriptionSummary: New York stands out as a surprisingly safe haven for teenage drivers, defying its notorious traffic reputation. WalletHub's comprehensive analysis ranks the state first among all 50 US states in terms of teen driver safety.

description: Despite being rarer, the Mercedes-Benz 300 SL Roadster has always lived in the long shadow of its winged predecessor. descriptionSummary: The Mercedes-Benz 300 SL Roadster has long played second fiddle to its sleeker, more iconic cousin - the Gullwing Coupe. Yet, this rarer roadster holds its own in a world of supercars and knockoff fame.

title: 2026 Subaru Outback Prices Jump — Should You Buy the 2025 Model Instead?
description: The Subaru Outback is one of the last wagons (albeit rugged) still available in the US. With standard all-wheel drive, decent ground clearance, and a loyal following, it has long been the halfway point between a family car and an adventure-ready crossover. However, everything changed with the ...
titleSummary: New Subaru Outback Pricing Hikes Spur Question: Hold Out for Last Year's Model?
descriptionSummary: In a market dominated by crossovers, the Subaru Outback remains one of the few rugged wagons still available in the US. Its standard all-wheel drive and generous ground clearance make it an ideal compromise between practicality and off-road capability.

title: The Last Big Audi RS Hangs On By The Skin Of Its Teeth
description: As Audi reinvents its nomenclature, the automaker is slimming down its lineup. The two most recent victims, the A7 and sportier S7, won't make it to 2026. However, the hi-po Audi RS7 manages to survive. According to an Audi spokesperson, the sedans will no longer be sold in the North American ...
titleSummary: "Audi's Top-Performer Faces Final Farewell After Years of Unyielding Performance"
descriptionSummary: Audi is streamlining its lineup as part of a broader naming convention overhaul. The A7 and S7 have been dropped from the company's 2026 plans, but the high-performance RS7 sedan has been spared. It will remain available for North American buyers.

title: The 2026 Porsche Macan Electric Has A New Feature Every Car Should Have
description: Let's all own up to something right now: no matter how long you've been driving, reversing in a tight spot is tough. descriptionSummary: Reversing into tight spaces can be a daunting task, even for seasoned drivers. I've had the chance to get familiar with numerous vehicles, but still find myself getting a bit nervous when trying to maneuver a new car into a small space.

title: Cadillac F1's First Race Car Will Probably Be a Ferrari
description: The irony is almost too perfect to believe. Team principal Graeme Lowdon confirmed that Cadillac plans to use a rival squad for its Testing of ...

descriptionSummary: In a surprising twist, Cadillac's maiden voyage into Formula 1 is set to begin with a test drive in a Ferrari, the very car it will eventually compete against on the track.

descriptionSummary: Following hot on the heels of the refreshed Corolla Sedan, Toyota is now giving its compact Corolla Hatchback a similar mid-cycle facelift for 2026. The updated model boasts a sleek new FX Edition trim and a range of other enhancements.

title: This Tiny EV Truck Can Take On The Toyota Tacoma
